title: Seriously, can we get back all of the champion select quotes now?
body: New champerino select makes me want to fall asleep. Can we please get back all of the champion select quotes? It has so much more flavor to it, and nobody asked for them to be removed in the first place

replies.body:
{{champion:82}} 
I shall ~~bring~~ **Hue** great ~~suffering~~ **Huehue**!

{{champion:40}} 
The ~~tempest~~ bad tempered teammates ~~are~~ aren't at your command.

{{champion:202}} 
In ~~carnage~~ THIS GAME WHAT WE ARE PLAYING I ~~bloom~~ PERFORM EFFECTIVELY, like a ~~flower in the dawn~~ PRODUCTIVE CITIZEN.
Wait, what did I miss?
Add an opt in option, riot PLEASE. It made me so hyped.

> [{quoted}](name=HayRoss,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=uG8gHvFl,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-11T16:06:52.235+0000)
>
> New champerino select makes me want to fall asleep. Can we please get back all of the champion select quotes? It has so much more flavor to it, and nobody asked for them to be removed in the first place

HayRoss!

This isn't something that we'll be putting back into the current client. However, we are exploring the possibility of this feature coming back for the new League Client. Ultimately, we don't want to create too much sonic clutter during Champ Select. We're actually experimenting with this right now to try and find a nice balance of clarity and excitement during Champ Select.

Thanks for reaching out!

I actually found it exciting and not aurally cluttered at all. I even felt like it gave _more_ clarity to some degree, as I quickly learned what champions said what lines and, just like the picture/name, learned to associate those lines with their respective champions.

"_Time to troll!_" Oh hey. It's Trundle.

"_Tactical decision, Summoner._" So I'm facing Lux.

"_Shurima! Your emperor has returned!_" DAMMIT! THEY TOOK MY MAIN!

"_To the arena!_" I wasn't around for his release, but hearing about it gives me nightmares.

"_Ok._" Ok.

> DAMMIT! THEY TOOK MY MAIN!

That sad moment when Azir gets picked by the enemy team, I know it. ;-;

So it's just like the Solo Queue?

_"Don't worry, it's just temporary!"
"We will turn it on later!"
"We may turn it on later!"
"We have to assess, if it's worth to turn it on at all."
"There certainly is a universe, where it's turned on."_
Hardly comparable.

An option in the sound settings feels like it'd do the best for both worlds. Maybe even a little prompt for a user's first champ select indicating if they want the extra sounds on or not.

I have to admit, when Jhin is picked in old champ select I'm like, "BLAH BLAH NOBODY GIVES A FUCK!!!"

Well all of your testers must had ADHD or something. I personally loved it. There were a lot of champs that I don't have, and hearing their quotes / voices actually got me interested in them as a character, or the lore. It was a very welcomed addition, it actually made it feel like you were going against them rather than just a portrait.

I understand why you would remove it (and why you don't want to change things in the current client while you're working on the LCU) but I still have hopes for the future and it makes me happy that you're considering it :)

> Ultimately, we don't want to create too much sonic clutter during Champ Select. 

you DONT want to create too much sonic clutter? 

I have my settings to mute the damn thing because it's all "look at me look at me splash art splash art spalsh art lock lock browse browse look at me look at me"

new champion select is an absolute visual and sonic cacophony with way too many "art assets" for the information it provides and so much attempt at "you need to stay here and pay attention" that i actually mute the client, zone out and miss my turn. 

if champion select had much, much , much less sound in it, I could maybe turn up the volume and get my audio cue proper.

Bring back epic Ranked music in champion select!

Old select was easily 3 times better sounding from the music alone.
Yes I loved that feature, really brought champ select to life.

{{champion:37}} "_Only you can hear me, Summoner_." All 10 people hear her.

_Almighty._
wuts a summoner?
You, and everyone else in the lobby. So 10 summoners in each game.
I dunno guy, uncle rito told me they be fake.

I personally loved it because you could switch windows during champion select and still hear what champs were picked.

The new select feels dry and lifeless without it. They should have at least added a setting in the options menu.

The reason they were removed was because they were distracting people from picking. Once they were removed Riot noticed more people were not unintentionally dodging by not locking in. 
That being said there are still fixes to this problem. Riot could just make it so the champion before you pick doesn't say their quote so the audio queue would still be audible to the person picking. Why this hasn't happened yet...eh. It's rito.
